name: Kingdom's Flee
description:
Submission for the 3-days long Half Decent Studios Game Jam #1.
Theme : "Sacrifices Must Be Made"

                                                                                                                           

Kingdom's Flee

Your kingdom has been attacked ! You had to quickly run for you life, thus you havn't taken any weapon or people with you. All you have is a bit of gold. You need to go and find people from your kingdom, as well as gold. 

During this infinite scrolling game, you'll have to make multiple decisions, which each will have a repercussion on your gold or people count. If your people count reaches 0, it's game over !

                                                                                                                           

Credits : 
  • Music : sauer2 - OpenGameArt
  • Clic SFX : jsfxr
  • Campfire SFX : Sauron974 - pixabay
  • Dialogue SFXs : Alan Dalacastagne - itch.io
  • Font : Jayvee Enaguas - Dafont
